definition: to throw oneself at/to pounce on/to devote one's energies/to flap/to flutter/to dab/to pat/to bend over
to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent
breath/news/interest (on an investment or loan)/to cease/to stop/to rest/Taiwan pr. [xi2]

sentences.english: In addition, 500 mg paracetamol was given three times daily.
sentences.chinese: 此外，給出了500毫克每日三次撲熱息痛。

sentences.english: Paracetamol (eg Panadol, Calpol) or aspirin (eg Disprin, Aspro clear) will relieve any fever.
sentences.chinese: 撲熱息痛和阿司匹林可以減輕發熱。
